roleset.name: pack again

example.name: intransitive
example.text: On the voyage to New Zealand, the luggage was in their cabin only once, when-1 they repacked *trace*-1;

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: They repacked their clothes and other items

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: Wagner gave his last sermon at sea and Mamma (and others) cried as they repacked their trunks and baggage and prepared for disembarkation.

example.name: repacking bearings
example.text: I ordered from Planet Miata for new front hubs + bearings, and they stated they repacked the bearings with better grease.

roleset.note: REPACK-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Call Home, pack-v.01. No VNcls. (from repack.01-v)
